text: The Men's 50 metre backstroke competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 10 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Kliment Kolesnikov||align=left|||align=left|24.00||Glasgow||4 August 2018 |- |African record||align=left|Gerhard Zandberg||align=left|||align=left|24.34||Rome||2 August 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|Ahmed Hussein||align=left|||align=left|26.00||Cairo||12 August 2002 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text- align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
